series: Revue des Nouvelles Technologies de l'Information
title: Un système de détection de thématiques populaires sur Twitter
abstract: With the ever-growing amount of messages exchanged via Twitter, there is an increasinginterest in filtering this information, which is delivered under the form of a stream of messages.In this paper, we present a system for detecting popular topics in Twitter. The system can beapplied to static corpora and can also handle the live Twitter stream.
